Akira Nishiguchi.

A thief, a murderer, and a charming lady-killer is on the run from the police.
Director Shohei Imamura turns this fact-based story about the seventy-eight-day
killing spree of a remorseless man from a devoutly Catholic family into a cold,
perverse, and at times diabolically funny examination of the primitive coexisting
with the modern. More than just a true-crime tale, Vengeance Is Mine bares
humanityÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s snarling id.
